branchCategory.name: 90-ZSE40, High Precision Digital Pressure Switch
branchCategory.description: <p>High precision digital pressure switch seris 90-ZSE40A series is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing..  Abnormal values can be seen at a glance on the 2-color display.  The settings of the master pressure switch can be copied to up to 10 slave pressure switches, reducing the setting work, and preventing mistakes in setting.  </p>
